tool.name: setworkspace

param.name: Output_Workspace
param.dialogReference: The folder to which all BTM output data will be saved by default.
param.pythonReference: The folder to which all BTM output data will be saved by default.

tool.summary: Use this tool to set a default workspace location to be used by the Benthic Terrain Modeler (BTM) toolbox.
tool.usage:
• The path specified in this tool will be used as the default location for the output data of all other tools.

  • If a default workspace was set previously using this tool, it will be overwritten each time the tool is run.

  • This tool only changes the workspace used by BTM and does not affect any other workspace settings used by ArcMap.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use this tool to set a default workspace location to be used by the Benthic Terrain Modeler (BTM) toolbox.

searchKeys.keyword: set workspace BTM default environment benthic terrain modeler
